price: 21. Nabiyow wagitaay cubbus addunyal garu garuk keenik (seehada kinnuk) elle muxxusne inna rizqhii kee taamal, usun akeeral ittak Ion baxxo darajaatah wohuk nabuk raqtaah muxxoh nabuk raqta moominiinih.
arabic: ٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ فَضَّلۡنَا بَعۡضَهُمۡ عَلَىٰ بَعۡضٖۚ وَلَلۡأٓخِرَةُ أَكۡبَرُ دَرَجَٰتٖ وَأَكۡبَرُ تَفۡضِيلٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: unẓur kayfa faḍḍalnā baʿḍahum ʿalā baʿḍin walalākhiratu akbaru darajātin wa-akbaru tafḍīlan
